name: Ahmad
headerTaglineThree: Your next Full Stack Software Engineer

projects.title: Tenant Score
projects.description: Landing page for a game-changing tenant seeker experience created using React.js, Styled Components, HTML, CSS, & JS.

projects.title: Birim
projects.description: A Better Rideshare Alternative built using HTML, Tailwind CSS, JS, React.js, Next.js, Firebase for Authentication, & Styled Components.

projects.title: Gap Bezan
projects.description: An online messaging platform used to connect individuals all across the world! Built with HTML, CSS, React.js, Redux, Firebase, Google Auth, and Material UI.

projects.title: Imaanx Electronics
projects.description: A transition from a small business to a booming E-commerce Store. Immanx Electronics is built using HTML, CSS, React.js, Next.js, Sanity and Stripe payment integration.

projects.title: Shinobi World
projects.description: A childhood dream come true. This project has a custom API built from scratch. It utilizes HTML, CSS, Express.js, Node.js, Heroku, Git and much more.

services.title: Web App Development
services.description: Front-end and back-end web development and design, from wireframes and UI/UX design, to Full Stack Web Applications

services.title: Responsive Design
services.description: Built to look and perform beautifully on all types of devices, with a page structure that is logical and helps users (and search engines) browse efficiently

services.title: SEO
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Human-centered approach to all design decisions so that products feel custom built for the target audience and is easy-to-navigate

aboutpara:
Hello, World! My name is Ahmad, and I am a full-stack software engineer focused on the Front End.

My technology stack includes:

HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Styled Components, Javascript, MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Firebase, Google Auth, Azure Auth, Azure Machine Learning, PostgreSQL, NoSQL, OOP, Web Accessibility, and much more!
